embed.title: Verify Your Account
description: Welcome! Click the button for your exchange to verify your affiliate status.
After clicking, you'll be asked to provide your UID to confirm your qualifying deposit.
embed.missingContextError: Guild and channel ID are required to publish verification embed.

failure.retainAccess: If you already have a verified role, you will retain access.

lines: Share the new passkey with the incoming owner so they can register:
For production environments, communicate the passkey securely.
‚Ä¢ {{ prefix }}{{ verifyCommand }} ‚Äì Verify your affiliate account. Usage: {{ prefix }}{{ verifyCommand }} <uid> [exchange]
‚Ä¢ {{ prefix }}{{ setupCommand }} ‚Äì Set up verification for your server (admins only). Usage: {{ prefix }}{{ setupCommand }}
‚Ä¢ {{ prefix }}{{ settingsCommand }} ‚Äì Manage verification settings (admins only). Usage: {{ prefix }}{{ settingsCommand }} show
‚Ä¢ {{ prefix }}{{ statsCommand }} ‚Äì Display trading statistics (admins only). Usage: {{ prefix }}{{ statsCommand }} [exchange|all]
‚Ä¢ {{ prefix }}{{ ownerCommand }} ‚Äì Manage bot ownership (owner only). Usage: {{ prefix }}{{ ownerCommand }} list-admins
‚Ä¢ {{ prefix }}{{ helpCommand }} ‚Äì Display this command reference. Usage: {{ prefix }}{{ helpCommand }}

setupGroup.unauthorised: You need to be a Telegram admin to prepare group onboarding codes.
setupGroup.unableToDetermineUserId: I could not determine your Telegram user ID. Please try again.
setupGroup.noActiveCode: You do not have any active setup codes. Send /setupgroup to generate one.
instructions: Here is how to link a new group or channel:
1. Add this bot as an administrator in the destination with permission to create invite links.
2. Post the one-time setup code below in that space. Only you can complete the link.
3. I will reply in the group and confirm here once everything is saved.
setupGroup.oneTimeCode: One-time setup code (valid for {{ minutes }} minutes): {{ code }}
setupGroup.cancelInstructionText: Need to start over? Send /setupgroup cancel to invalidate this code.
setupGroup.postLinkingInfoText: After linking, verified members will automatically receive invite links for every saved space.
setupGroup.noSpacesLinked: No Telegram groups or channels are linked yet.
setupGroup.codePostedInWrongPlace: This setup code must be posted inside the group or channel you would like to link.
setupGroup.codeExpired: This setup code has expired. Please run /setupgroup again to generate a fresh one.
setupGroup.codeExpiredNotification: The setup code {{ code }} expired before it was used.
setupGroup.postFromPersonalAccount: Please post the setup code from your personal account so I can confirm your admin access.
setupGroup.wrongSender: Only the administrator who generated this setup code can complete the link. Ask them to post it directly.
wrongSenderNotification: Heads up: someone attempted to use your setup code but the sender ID did not match your account.
The code remains active for you to reuse within the original validity window.
setupGroup.anonymousPostDetected: I detected this setup code was posted anonymously. I've asked the issuing administrator to confirm it via DM.
anonymousConfirmationPrompt: If this was you, tap Approve below or send {{ command }} to confirm.
The link will expire when the setup code does.
setupGroup.confirmCodeNotFound: I could not find an active setup code matching {{ code }}.
setupGroup.confirmWrongAdmin: Only the administrator who generated this setup code can confirm it.
setupGroup.confirmExpired: Setup code {{ code }} expired before it could be confirmed. Please generate a new one.
setupGroup.confirmMissingConfirmation: I could not find a confirmation request for that code. Post it in the target space again so I can verify it.
setupGroup.confirmChatMismatch: This confirmation request targets a different space (chat ID {{ expected }}).
setupGroup.confirmAccepted: Group link approved. I'll update the configuration now.
setupGroup.alreadyLinked: ‚ÑπÔ∏è This space is already linked. No changes were required, you can delete this code.
alreadyLinkedNotification: This group was already on the invite list.
linkSuccess: ‚úÖ Thanks! This space is now linked to the verification flow.
Verified members will automatically receive single-use invite links here.
You can safely delete this setup code message.
linkSuccessNotification: Invite links for verified members will now include this space automatically.
Run /setupgroup again whenever you need to add another group or channel.
setupGroup.linkFailed: ‚ö†Ô∏è I could not save this space: {{ message }}
linkFailedNotification: ‚ö†Ô∏è Something went wrong while saving that group.
Please resolve the issue and run /setupgroup again when ready.

commands: ‚Ä¢ /setupgroup ‚Äì Link a new Telegram group or channel (admins only). Usage: /setupgroup | /setupgroup cancel | /setupgroup confirm <code> <chatId>
‚Ä¢ /settings ‚Äì Manage verification settings (admins only). Usage: /settings show
‚Ä¢ /stats ‚Äì Display trading volume statistics (admins only). Usage: /stats [exchange|all]
‚Ä¢ /owner ‚Äì Manage bot ownership and admin access (owner only). Usage: /owner list-admins
help.detailedHelp: Use /settings or /owner without arguments to see detailed subcommand help.

errors.minimumVolumeInvalid: minimumVolume must be a finite number.
errors.alreadyVerified: UID already verified by another account.
